original_title: miwa live tour 2018 38/39DAY / acoguissimo 47 Todofuken ~ Kan ~
overview: Features the final of the tour held by miwa, "acoguissimo" at Yokohama Arena. Comes with a bonus live CD. Also includes ones held at Nippon Budokan on March 8 and 9, 2018.
title: miwa live tour 2018 38/39DAY / acoguissimo 47 Todofuken ~ Kan ~
